programme.title: Democrat victory 1998 midterms
programme.short_synopsis: The Democrats make historical gains in the 1998 midterms and Clinton's confidence returns.
programme.medium_synopsis: Clinton's Democrats gain seats in the 1998 midterm election, a first for a US ruling party since Roosevelt and 1934, California goes Democrat and Clinton regains his confidence.
